Hordern), te nastave zajedno. Kad nalete na Fanny, svo troje krenu u susret novim uzbudljivim pustolovinama... Nominirana za nagradu BAFTA u kategoriji najbolje kostimografije, te za Zlatni globus u kategoriji najbolje sporedne ženske uloge (Ann-Margret), dinamična, frivolna i zabavna kostimirana pustolovna romantična komedija Tonyja Richardsona uspjela je adaptacija romana The History and Adventures of Joseph Andrews and of his Friend Abraham Adams, glasovitog britanskog romanopisca, dramatičara i satiričara Henryja Fieldinga. Cijenjeni britanski producent, scenarist i redatelj Tony Richardson (Osvrni se gnjevno, The Entertainer, Hamlet, Ned Kelly, Granica, Hotel New Hampshire, Plavo nebo), otac glumica Natashe i Joely Richardson, impresivno je adaptirao možda najpoznatije Fieldingovo djelo, opsežan i precizno konstruiran pikarski roman Tom Jones, za čiju je majstorsku režiju osvojio Oscara i Zlatni globus. Večerašnji film šarmantno je, duhovito i zabavno ostvarenje. Zasluge za to pripadaju i raspoloženoj glumačkoj postavi, koju predvodi u vrijeme snimanja mladi P. Firth (Tessa, čista žena, Aerodrom, Pismo Brežnjevu, Zatočenik Ria, Lov na Crveni oktobar, Zemlja sjenki, Moćni Joe Young, Pearl Harbor, serija Neočekivane priče). Njegovi su partneri poznata karakterna glumica Ann-Margret (Džep pun čuda, Cincinnati Kid, Povratak ratnika, Samo dvaput u životu, 52 Pick-Up, Dva stara pajdaša, Samo igra, Taxi), za uloge u filmovima "Tommy" i "Carnal Knowledge" nominirana za Oscara, izvrsni M. Hordern (U orlovskom gnijezdu, Barry Lyndon, Gandhi, serija Inspektor Morse) i iskusna B. Reid (Inspektor Clouseau, The Killing of Sister George, Vjetar u vrbiku), za nastupe u serijama Dečko, dama, kralj, špijun i Smileyevi ljudi ovjenčana nagradom BAFTA. Filmsku fotografiju potpisuje daroviti David Watkin (Kvaka 22, Tri mušketira, Četiri mušketira, Robin i Marian, Hanover Street, Kuba, Vatrene kočije, Yentl, Opčinjena mjesecom, Memphis Belle, Hamlet, Glorija), stalni suradnik Richarda Lestera za svoj rad na hvaljenoj drami "Moja Afrika" Sidneya Pollacka ovjenčan Oscarom i nagradom BAFTA

programme.title: Kraljevi sunca
Kings Of The Sun
programme.desc: Suočen sa smrtnom pogibelji kojom njegovu narodu prijeti neprijatelj naoružan nadmoćnijim, metalnim, oružjem, kralj Maya Balam (G. Chakiris) jedini izlaz vidi u egzodusu preko "velike vode" i pronalaženju novoga životnoga prostora. Tako Maye prelaze golemi Meksički zaljev i susreću se sa starosjediocima, sjevernoameričkim Indijancima. Zarobivši indijanskoga poglavicu Crnoga Orla (Y. Brynner), pridošlice su ponovno pred neizvjesnim ratom. Krvoproliće potiču i mayski svećenici koji ljudskom žrtvom, uobičajenom u njihovoj religiji, žele umilostiviti bogove. Ni plemenita Ixchel (S. A. Field), koja podjednako cijeni vrline obojice vođa, svojom neodlučnošću ne pridonosi prijateljstvu dvojice muškaraca. No, Balamova mudrost i Orlova hrabrost približit će njihove narode i spasiti ih od stradanja... Na kraju pedesetih i početkom šezdesetih godina prošloga stoljeća spektakl kao podvrsta povijesnoga filma doživljavao je jedan od svojih uzlaznih trenutaka. "Kraljevi sunca" vrsnog britansko-američkog zanatlije J. Leeja Thompsona (Topovi s Navarona) prema scenariju Elliotta Arnolda (TV serije Bonanza i Slomljena strijela) i Jamesa R. Webba (Kako je osvojen Divlji zapad, Jesen Cheyenna), razlikuje se od prepoznatljiva žanrovskog obrasca. Naime, umjesto uobičajenoga krvavoga sraza dvaju prirodno suprotstavljenih naroda (poljodjelaca i lovaca, pridošlica i starosjedilaca) i njihovih vođa (nasljednoga kralja i izabranoga poglavice), dodir završava mirnim suživotom u kojemu do izražaja dolaze najbolje od vrijednosti njihovih kultura i vjerovanja. Redatelj je pristupom otvorio prostor i za glumačko nadmetanje u kojemu je Y. Brynner (Kralj i ja, Sedmorica veličantsvenih), egzotičnošću i stiliziranim pokretima, zasjenio partnere G. Chakirisa (Priča sa Zapadne strane) i S. A. Field (Slušaj moju pjesmu)

programme.title: Mr. Mom
programme.desc: Nakon što su ga otpustili s posla, muž i žena menjaju uloge, a on će ostati kod kuće i biti domaćica, dobiće ulogu o kojoj nema pojma

programme.title: Roditelji špijuni
Undercover blues
programme.desc: Jeff (Dennis Quaid) i Jane Blue (Kathleen Turner) samo su na prvi pogled obični roditelji jedanaestomjesečne djevojčice. Oni su zapravo pravi špijuni američke CIA-e koji su odlučili kako je došao trenutak da se malo odmore od napornog posla špijunaže za američku vladu i posvete svojoj novorođenoj djevojčici. Tako ih put odvedi u New Orleans, gdje će ih dočekati sve osim toliko željenog odmora. Naime, CIA je doznao kako se upravo u New Orleansu skriva tražena češka tajna agentica Paulina Novacek (Fiona Shaw) te su mama i tata Blue zamoljeni da riješe još samo ovaj važan zadatak. Odmor im svakako neće olakšati ni sitni kriminalac Morty (Stanley Tucci) koji će im se naći na putu. Ova zabavna priča o „super-obitelji" koja je uz odanost, ljubav i posvećenost djeci u svoje obiteljske vrijednosti uključila i špijunažu te lov na „zločeste dečke", odlična je komedija koja će do suza nasmijati čitavu obitelj. U priči o „super-mami" i „super-tati" naslovne su uloge podijelili uvijek rado viđeni Dennis Quaid i Kathleen Turner, koju najviše pamtimo iz legendarnog filma „Čast Prizzijevih". Kritika je ogroman doprinos uspjehu filma pripisala i fantastičnom komičaru Stanleyu Tucci kojeg pratimo u manjoj ulozi smiješnog sitnog kriminalca

programme.title: Yours, Mine and Ours
programme.desc: When the widow Helen North marries the widower Frank Beardsley, the two must find a place to house their 18 kids (she had 8, he had 10). The new family struggles to become a unified whole as the children have an "ours" and "theirs" mentality

programme.title: Sunburn
programme.desc: Dekker, an insurance investigator is hired to probe a five million dollar claim on a wealthy industrialist killed in Acapulco. He hires Ellie, a naive but beautiful model to pose as his wife and soon discovers a web of international intrigue

programme.title: Remo: Nenaoružan i opasan
Remo williams: the adventure begins
programme.desc: Remo Williams (Fred Ward) nekada je bio hvaljeni policajac koji je odano i pošteno čistio njujorške ulice od kriminalaca, a sada mu je prisilno dan nov identitet, novo lice i nova zadaća koja stiže direktno od predsjednika SAD-a. Naime, Remo je protiv svoje volje postao dijelom tajne vladine agencije koja se bori protiv korupcije i najopasnijih zločinaca na visokim položajima. On sada mora ovladati tajnom korejskom borilačkom vještinom, kojom je moguće nekoga ubiti i to prikazati kao prirodnu smrt, te se uputiti u lov na najgore kriminalce. Nominacija za Oskara i Zlatni globus nesvakidašnja su vrijedna priznanja za akcijske filmove ove vrste stoga svakako svjedoče o uspjehu filma Guya Hamiltona, kako pred kritikom, tako i među publikom. Remov lik oduševit će sve ljubitelje akcije, a neobično podsjeća na Jamesa Bonda uz dodatak istočnjačkih borilačkih vještina. Fred Ward, kojeg pratimo u ulozi Rema, na svoju je policu spremio mnoge filmske kipiće, uključujući one s Venecijanskog filmskog festivala, kao i jedan Zlatni globus

programme.title: Delirious
programme.desc: Jack is the head writer for a successful soap opera, and he's sweet on the show's star, lovely Laura. It's easy for everyone but Jack to see that she's playing him for a sap. But a conk on the head brings Jack some new insights - and some new powers. He finds himself in Ashford Falls, site of his fictional soap opera -- and everything he writes comes true! It's a fantastic opportunity to get Rachel, Laura's character, to fall in love with him. But life isn't easy even in the fictional world, and even when you're the author

programme.title: Čovjek sa željeznom maskom
Man in the Iron Mask, The
programme.desc: Rakošna pustolovna kostimirana drama o borbi četvorice već umirovljenih mušketira, koji Francusku pokušavaju spasiti od mlada okrutnoga kralja. Godine 1638. mladi kralj Luj XIV. (Leonardo Di Caprio) živi na svom dvoru u luksuzu i dekadenciji, dok građani Francuske istodobno umiru od gladi. Od četiri mušketira, koja su vjerno služila njegovome ocu, jedino je DArtagnan (Gabriel Byrne) ostao u kraljevoj službi. On je sada kapetan kraljevske garde i čuva mladoga vladara pod cijenu vlastita života. Ostala trojica Aramis (Jeremy Irons), Athos (John Malkovich) i Porthos (Gérard Depardieu) - žive mirnim civilnim životom. Aramis je vođa jezuitskoga reda, Porthos posve predan svjetovnim užicima, a Athos ponosni otac mladoga Raoula (Peter Sarsgaard). Raoul je zaručen za lijepu i čednu Christine, no onoga trenutka kada na nju oko baci razvratni Luj, njegovoj sreći je kraj... Očajni Athos, ali ni ostali mušketiri, više ne mogu podnositi bešćutno ponašanje mladoga kralja i odluče se za nevjerojatan plan kojim će okrutnoga vladara zauvijek smijeniti "

programme.title: A Dangerous Woman
programme.desc: Martha Horgan is mentally slow. She lives with her aunt Frances. She is known for NEVER lying. This.

programme.title: Sunnyside
programme.desc: An emotionally charged saga of explosive violence and romance set in New York City as a family fight for survival in an area infested by street gangs

programme.title: Djevojka iz Jerseyja
Jersey Girl
programme.desc: Mladi direktor Oliver Ollie Trinke (Ben Affleck) uspješan je PR u glazbenoj industriji. Kada se upozna i zaljubi u Gertrude Steiney (Jennifer Lopez), ona ubrzo zatrudni. Međutim, umre na porođaju i Ollie se iz New Yorka odluči vratiti u očev dom u New Jersey. Pod stresom zbog novonastale situacije, radišni Ollie izgubi posao i dospije na crnu listu. Tugujući za suprugom, obeća kćeri Gertie da će biti najbolji otac na svijetu. Sljedećih sedam godina provodi u nakani da vrati stari ugled. Jednoga dana upozna službenicu Mayu (Liv Tyler) s kojom se sprijatelji. Ona mu pomaže da prebrodi prošlost

programme.title: Frikovi
Psych
programme.desc: Gus se suočio sa Shawnom u vezi s novcem koji mu duguje za vikend u odmorištu proveden s Juliet. Shawn kaže da se silno trudi zaraditi novac da mu može vratiti, ali nisu imali puno slučajeva. Gus predlaže Shawnu da proda zaručnički prsten koji nikad nije dao Juliet, ali Shawn ne želi ni čuti jer je prsten pripadao njegovoj baki. Uostalom, želi ga imati uza se za svaki slučaj

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Jake treba vratiti vlastima čovjeka koji se nije pojavio na suđenju, no možda je u neprijatelju naišao na sebi ravna. Des prima neočekivanu pohvalu

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Jake i Mal upoznaju zagonetnu mladu ženu koja se, čini se, ne može držati podalje od nevolje. Desu slučaj budi loša sjećanja

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Nakon bijega iz zatvora grad preplave odbjegli zločinci. Jake je zabrinut kad Tinny prijete smrću, a ona ignorira njegova upozorenja

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Kad Becker otme Tinny, Jake i Crocker nevoljko udružuju snage u pokušaju da je spase

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Doyleovi sa zakašnjenjem saznaju gdje je Jake bio protekla dva mjeseca. Tinny prelazi granicu kad pomaže svojoj obitelji

programme.title: Umorstva u Midsomeru
Midsomer murders
programme.desc: Golem kolut svjetski poznatog midsomerskog sira s plemenitom plijesni padne na ženu i ubije je. Otkriju se tajni i kontroverzni planovi za modernizaciju mljekare, a tračevi o privatnim životima roditelja izazovu svađu u uglednoj privatnoj srednjoj školi. Kad umre još ljudi povezanih s mljekarom, na vidjelo počnu izlaziti dobro čuvane tajne.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
Hawaii five-0
programme.desc: Trojica muškaraca bude se mamurni i u kadi svoje hotelske sobe pronalaze mrtvu ženu. Ničega se ne sjećaju, pa je na ekipi da otkrije što se dogodilo

programme.title: Dobra žena
Good wife
programme.desc: Pravnička serija koja prati teške odluke koje stoje pred Alicijom Florrick (Julianna Margulies) dok balansira između profesionalnog i osobnog života

programme.title: Liječnik na narudžbu
Royal Pains
programme.desc: Kad je zbog pogreške na receptu ugrožen život Erica Kassabiana, Hank krivi dr. Van Dykea. Paige daje Evanu vrlo zanimljivu ponudu

programme.title: Liječnik na narudžbu
Royal Pains
programme.desc: Hankovi problemi s povjerenjem u Divyju dolaze u prvi plan kad moraju surađivati kako bi otkrili uzrok bolesti rock grupe

programme.title: Smrtonosno more
Deadliest Sea
programme.desc: Kad se aljaška ribarica nađe u oluji, posada napušta brod u Berinškom moru prije negoli se prevrne

programme.title: Doba dinosaura
Age of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Biotehnička tvrtka u Los Angelesu stvori skupinu dinosaura, a kad oni pobjegnu, bivši vatrogasac mora spasiti svoju kćer od kaosa

programme.title: Kralj škorpiona 2: Uspon ratnika
The Scorpion King 2: Rise of a Warrior
programme.desc: Mathayus postaje prognani junak kad odbije dokazati slijepu odanost novom vođi Crnog škorpiona, Sargonu

programme.title: Braća Grimm
The brothers grimm
programme.desc: komedija, pustolovni. Glumci Matt Damon i Heath Ledger utjelovljuju Wilhelma i Jacoba Grimm-a, legendarnu braću tvorce naših omiljenih bajki. Oni kreću u nezaboravnu pustolovinu svijetom heroja i zločinaca, vještica i trolova, vječnoga zla i prave ljubavi - to je kraljevstvo koje su dvoje pisaca sami kreirali u svojim bajkama - i sada su se i sami našli u njemu... Sada se suočavaju sa vlastitim maštarijama koje su oživjele, sudjelujući u epskoj borbi između stvarnosti i mašte.

programme.title: Zločesti Djed Mraz
Bad santa
programme.desc: Tradicionalna božićna priča više nikad neće biti ista nakon ove vješto izokrenute i veselo bezobzirne priče o Djedu Božićnjaku koji je toliko loš da postaje vragolasto smiješna. U filmu Terryja Zwigoffa pojavljuje se Billy Bob Thornton kao jedan od najnepoštenijih, najkorumpiranijih i potpuno histeričnih Djeda Božićnjaka koji se ikada pojavio na ekranu. Inspiriran mješavinom filmskih klasika, uključujući skandalozne viceve iz The Bad News Bears" i drskost "South Park" te tračak blagdanskog duha iz "A Christmas Carol", Zločesti Djed Mraz je Božićna komedija drugačija od svih ostalih. Neposredno nakon dvaju fimova koji su mu donijeli ploda i odobravanje kritike- "Crumb" i "Ghost World"- redatelj Terry Zwigoff pojavljuje se sa svojom najpristupačnijom komedijom do sada ne okolišajući u istraživanju smiješne strane Božića. Izazivajući smijeh, film izruguje blagdanske tradicije poput neobuzdanog komercijalizma i svete slike Djeda Božićnjaka. Billy Bob Thornton je Willie T. Stokes, istrošeni Djed Božoćnjak u jednoj robnoj kući koji je više zločest nego ljubazan i u tome si ne može pomoći. Ispod crvenog odijela, koje mu loše pristaje, Willie je zapravo obijač sefova koji jednom godišnje ostvaruje veliki dobitak- na Badnjak. Kad kupci krenu kući iz robne kuće, ovaj Djed Božićnjak i njegov prostodušan patuljak- Willijev patuljasti partner u zločinu Marcus (TONY COX)- provaljuju u sef i odlaze sa svojim blagdanskim zalihama. Ali onda dolazi Phoenix. Ovdje Djed Božićnjak i njegov patuljak shvate kako je njihov godišnji plijen ugrožen od strane dosadnog menađera robne kuće (JOHN RITTER), iskusnog detektiva (BERNIE MAC), seksi obožavateljice Djeda Božičnjaka (LAUREN GRAHAM) i osmogodišnjeg izroda punog problema (BRETT KELLY) koji odluči vjerovati kako je Willie pravi Djed Božičnjak kojeg traži. Ekipu filma čine Billy Bob Thornton, Bernie Mac, John Ritter (prvi put se pojavljuje s Billy Bob Thorntonom nakon "Sling Blade"), Lauren Graham, Tony Cox, Brett Kelly, Cloris Leachman i Lauren Tom. Redatelj je Terry Zwigoff, a scenaristi su John Requa i Glenn Ficarra. Izvršni producenti su Joel i Ethan Coen, a producenti Sarah Aubrey, John Cameron i Bob Weinstein

programme.title: Američka pita 5: Gola milja
American pie presents the naked mile
programme.desc: Iako Eric (John White) nosi prezime Stifler, još uvijek je djevac. Nije lako biti članom obitelji Stifler, a ne osjetiti čari ljubavnog života. Štoviše, nema naznaka da će se u Ericovom životu išta promijeniti jer njegova djevojka Tracy (Jessy Schram) nije spremna na seks. No bitna joj je njegova sreća i daje mu dozvolu da preko vikenda radi što mu srce poželi. S dopuštenjem da se provede kao nikad u životu, Eric i prijatelji se pridružuju “Goloj milji”, utrci u kojoj su sudionici posve goli i koja se održava u dvorištu sveučilišta. Ukoliko želite brojeve, recimo da je “Gola milja” peti od ukupno sedam nastavaka “Američke pite”. Ta činjenica serijal svrstava u najomiljeniju tinejdžersku TV zabavu ovog desetljeća, no to je manje bitno. Važnija je činjenica da će se gledatelji, koji su specifičan tinejdžerski humor kakav pruža „Američka pita“ i raskalašeno društvo sa samo jednom stvari na pameti, sjajno zabaviti i ovoga puta

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Mala i Rose angažiraju da štite starog prijatelja, no da bi otkrili što ga dovodi u opasnost, moraju istražiti njegov složeni radni život

programme.title: Rođeni policajci
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny istražuje ubojstvo 10-godišnjaka, dok je Frank uključen u slučaj mlade Turkinje koja se suočava s progonom

programme.title: Rođeni policajci
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny pomaže Erin u istrazi starog slučaja djevojke ubijene 1998., za koju se misli da ju je ubio dečko

programme.title: Plava krv (2010)
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny istražuje par koji je opljačkao banku u stilu Bonnie i Clydea. Erin napada fotografa

programme.title: Plava krv (2010)
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny traži vezu između naizgled nepovezanih žrtava ubojstva, Jamie upoznaje dječaka iz neskladne obitelji, a Frank pomaže prijatelju alkoholičaru

programme.title: Plava krv (2010)
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Kad umre mlada vjernica, Danny i Maria dolaze do iznenađujućeg otkrića. Frank raspravlja s bivšim policajcem koji želi osvetu

programme.title: Borba božićnih žaruljica
The Battle of the Bulbs
programme.desc: Nakon što su godinama imali najbolje okićenu kuću za Božić, obitelj Wallace ima konkurenciju u novom susjedu, starom srednjoškolskom suparniku

programme.title: Beethoven 4
Beethoven's 4th
programme.desc: U obitelji Newton sve bi bilo u najboljem redu da svaki dan nered ne radi njihov kućni ljubimac. To je, naravno, bernardinac Beethoven koji tatu Richarda (J. Reinhold) izluđuje raznoseći smeće po kući, a mamu Beth (J. Sweeney) uništavajući njezine putne kovčege. I dok ljutita Beth namjerava Beethovena poslati na farmu izvan grada, njezino dvoje djece Brennan (J. Pichler) i Sara (M. Gallo) smišljaju kako Beethovena naučiti lijepom ponašanju. To im neočekivano pođe za rukom kada se živahni pas zamijeni sa svojom slikom i prilikom Michelangelom iz bogataške obitelji Sedgewick. Michelangelo je, naime, iznimno miran i dobro odgojen pas te se Newtonovi nađu u čudu koliko se Beethoven promijenio. Isto pomisle i Sedgewickovi kada im se u kuću useli nemogući Beethoven... Ono što je među škotskim ovčarima Lassie, to je među bernardincima Beethoven. Započet 1992., filmski serijal o dražesnom i nestašnom bernardincu Beethovenu stigao je 2001. do svog četvrtog nastavka. Ovaj film režirao je kao i treći dio David Mickey Evans (Ed, First Kid), dok se scenarist John Loy (animirane serije Štrumfovi i Zemlja daleke prošlosti) nadahnuo klasičnim romanom Kraljević i prosjak Marka Twaina. Reinterpretacija dobro poznate priče o zamjeni identiteta, uz neizbježni kriminalistički podzaplet, zaživjela je u Evansovu filmu na dopadljiv i zabavan način pri čemu su simpatije publike na strani neodoljivog bernardinca i njegova mirnog dvojnika. Film je okupio gotovo istu glumačku ekipu kao i u prethodnom nastavku te tako Richarda Newtona tumači glumac J. Reinhold (Policajac s Beverly Hillsa, serija Seinfeld), Beth komičarka J. Sweeney (It's Pat, TV šou Saturday Night Live), Brennana četrnaestogodišnji J. Pichler (Shiloh 2: Shiloh Season, The Fan), a Saru tri godine mlađa M. Gallo (Essenced Echoes, serija Sedmo nebo)

programme.title: Umorstva u Midsomeru
Midsomer murders
programme.desc: Golem kolut svjetski poznatog midsomerskog sira s plemenitom plijesni padne na ženu i ubije je. Otkriju se tajni i kontroverzni planovi za modernizaciju mljekare, a tračevi o privatnim životima roditelja izazovu svađu u uglednoj privatnoj srednjoj školi. Kad umre još ljudi povezanih s mljekarom, na vidjelo počnu izlaziti dobro čuvane tajne.

programme.title: Umirovljeni istrebljivači
Invasion Roswell
programme.desc: Kad napadnu izvanzemaljci, Zemlji je jedina nada tim za specijalne operacije koji je morao u mirovinu kad su ih smatrali prestarima za učinkovitost

programme.title: Liječnik na narudžbu
Royal Pains
programme.desc: Kad je zbog pogreške na receptu ugrožen život Erica Kassabiana, Hank krivi dr. Van Dykea. Paige daje Evanu vrlo zanimljivu ponudu

programme.title: Liječnik na narudžbu
Royal Pains
programme.desc: Hankovi problemi s povjerenjem u Divyju dolaze u prvi plan kad moraju surađivati kako bi otkrili uzrok bolesti rock grupe

programme.title: Dobra žena
Good wife
programme.desc: Pravnička serija koja prati teške odluke koje stoje pred Alicijom Florrick (Julianna Margulies) dok balansira između profesionalnog i osobnog života

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
Hawaii five-0
programme.desc: Trojica muškaraca bude se mamurni i u kadi svoje hotelske sobe pronalaze mrtvu ženu. Ničega se ne sjećaju, pa je na ekipi da otkrije što se dogodilo

programme.title: Djevojka iz Jerseyja
Jersey Girl
programme.desc: Mladi direktor Oliver Ollie Trinke (Ben Affleck) uspješan je PR u glazbenoj industriji. Kada se upozna i zaljubi u Gertrude Steiney (Jennifer Lopez), ona ubrzo zatrudni. Međutim, umre na porođaju i Ollie se iz New Yorka odluči vratiti u očev dom u New Jersey. Pod stresom zbog novonastale situacije, radišni Ollie izgubi posao i dospije na crnu listu. Tugujući za suprugom, obeća kćeri Gertie da će biti najbolji otac na svijetu. Sljedećih sedam godina provodi u nakani da vrati stari ugled. Jednoga dana upozna službenicu Mayu (Liv Tyler) s kojom se sprijatelji. Ona mu pomaže da prebrodi prošlost

programme.title: Kralj škorpiona 2: Uspon ratnika
The Scorpion King 2: Rise of a Warrior
programme.desc: Mathayus postaje prognani junak kad odbije dokazati slijepu odanost novom vođi Crnog škorpiona, Sargonu

programme.title: Najgori scenarij

programme.title: Najgori scenarij

programme.title: Kad nas automobili ne slušaju

programme.title: Upozorili smo vas

programme.desc: 27. ožujka 2004. godine uragan prve kategorije kreće se prema državi Santa Catarina u jugoistočnom Brazilu, što je ugrozilo nekoliko ribarskih posada. Santa Catarina mora se suočiti s jedinim uraganom u povijesti brazilske obale

programme.desc: Bilo da je riječ o preplaćenom popravku auta, lažnom mediju ili laži, Brian nam pomaže uočiti prevarante i pobijediti

programme.title: Dešifriranje opasnosti
programme.desc: Niz katastrofa, od stravičnog incidenta u utrci na otoku Man, preko šokantnog događaja u Italiji pa sve do aeromitinga u Kaliforniji koji završi spektaklom koji nitko nije očekivao. Možete li pronaći tragove i razotkriti odakle prijeti opasnost

programme.title: Je li to istina?
programme.desc: Je li spontano ljudsko samozapaljivanje jeziva posljedica tajnovite vatre koja gori unutar naših tijela ili samo pogrešno tumačenje rijetke vrste vanjskog sagorijevanja? Pridružite se stručnjacima u ispitivanju dokaza i teorija

programme.title: Priče o olujama
programme.desc: Tjedni neprestane kiše uzrokovali su ogromno klizište blata u obalnoj zajednici La Conchita, Kalifornija, u siječnju 2005. Neki stanovnici uspjeli su pobjeći, no drugi nisu imali toliko sreće. Sve u svemu, deset osoba je nestalo

programme.title: Napušteno
programme.desc: Ekipa pronalazi gomilu stare opreme za benzinske crpke, ali kad te predmete trebaju odnijeti kući, Jayove su pregovaračke vještine na kušnji

programme.title: Dešifriranje opasnosti
programme.desc: U Turskoj kamion vozi prema željezničko-cestovnom prijelazu. Hoćete li uočiti gdje je opasnost u prijevozu goleme dizalice u Južnoj Americi? A u Rusiji podižu brod u vjetrovitim uvjetima. Pogledajte snimke i pogodite što će se dogoditi

programme.title: Napušteno
programme.desc: Ekipa pronalazi gomilu stare opreme za benzinske crpke, ali kad te predmete trebaju odnijeti kući, Jayove su pregovaračke vještine na kušnji

programme.title: Licitiraj i uništi
programme.desc: Dečki nalaze važne sportske suvenire kad obavljaju teško rušenje na kući u Auburnu u New Hampshireu

programme.title: Opaka tuna: Sjever protiv Juga II
Wicked Tuna: North Vs South II
programme.desc: Nakon sjajne sezone na Sjevernom Atlantiku neki od najboljih ribara New Englanda vraćaju se na jug u Outer Banks u Sjevernoj Karolini u misiji da ulove što veću zaradu. Ali na jugu nailaze na ozbiljnu konkurenciju, lokalnu legendu Charlieja Griffina

programme.title: Opaka tuna: Sjever protiv Juga II
Wicked Tuna: North Vs South II
programme.desc: Oregonski zaton, dio„Groblja Atlantika na ribarskom području Sjeverne Karoline, postaje mjesto dvaju brodoloma. Sjevernjački brod Hard Merchandise i Reels of Fortune, koji drži prvo mjesto, pretrpjeli su teške udare i golemu štetu

programme.title: Osvijetljavanje oceana
programme.desc: Nova perspektiva na mutne dubine oceanskog svijeta dok pomoću specijalnog računalnog animacijskog programa rasčišćavamo vodene kristale

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
programme.desc: 3. rujna 2010. UPS, let 6. Ubrzo nakon uzleta Boeinga 747 iz Dubaija, oglasio se alarm za požar. Nadajući se da će ugušiti plamen, piloti aktiviraju sustav za suzbijanje požara, ali situacija eskalira pa posada mora što prije prizemljiti masivni 747

programme.title: Primitivno preživljavanje
programme.desc: U prašumama jugoistočne Azije, Hazem mora koristiti vještine ribara plemena Lao Loum kako bi se popeo u srce vodopada i ulovio ribu u smrtonosnim brzacima. Kako bi do njih stigao, bori se s vrtlozima penjanjem na stabla puna zmija

programme.title: Živjeti slobodno ili umrijeti 2
programme.desc: Projekt Tonyja i Amelije izmiče kontroli, Derikove svojeglave mazge bježe iz tora, Thorn je sve vještiji u gaženju životinja na cesti, Tobiasov izvor vode presušuje, a Colbert, iako ozlijeđen, mora nastaviti raditi kako bi završio kolibu

programme.title: Sekunde do katastrofe
programme.desc: 1990. požar je izbio na trajektu Scandinavian Star. Mnogi su putnici poginuli. Istražitelji ispituju je li posrijedi nesretan slučaj ili palež

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća 11
programme.desc: Kad je alarm upozorio pilota na letu 518 da se opasno približava tlu, zrakoplov se iznenada zabio u planinu

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća 11
programme.desc: Istražujući kako se sigurnost avijacije poboljšava nakon svake nesreće, Istraga zrakoplovnih nesreća istražuje legendarne zrakoplovne katastrofe

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća 10
programme.desc: Samo je brzo razmišljanje kapetana Franka Geiba spasilo zrakoplov 85 tvrtke Northwest Airlines od katastrofe 2002. Što je zapravo pošlo po zlu

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
programme.desc: Transportni zrakoplov UN-a DC-6 leti u tajnu misiju, a među putnicima je i glavni tajnik UN-a general Dag Hammarskjöld. Nekoliko trenutaka prije slijetanja, zrakoplov udara o tlo, samo 16 km od piste. Smrt svjetskog vođe izazvala je šok i nevjericu

programme.title: Susret s kometom
programme.desc: Nevjerojatne nove snimke donose pogled izbliza na golemi komet koji je 2013. prošao kraj Zemljine orbite stvorivši svemirski spektakl stoljeća

programme.title: Istraživač
Explorer 2.0
programme.desc: Osjećate li se svladani baražnim napadima tehologije? Žudite li se osloboditi, isključiti tehnologiju i povezati se s prirodom? Znanstvenici dokazuju kako su ljudi koji vrijeme provode u prirodi puno zdraviji, veseliji, čak i pametniji

programme.title: Područje 51: CIA-ini tajni dosjei
programme.desc: Američka vojna baza Područje 51 predmet je špekulacija i teorija zavjere. Sada insajderi otkrivaju što se doista zbiva iza zatvorenih vrata

programme.title: Zvjezdani razgovori 2
programme.desc: Neil deGrasse razgovara s Ginom McCarthy iz američke Agencije za zaštitu okoliša. U raspravi o utjecaju klimatskih promjena i tehnologiji za nadzor i kontrolu okoliša Tysonu se pridružuju komičar Maeve Higgins i novinar Andrew Revkin

programme.title: Područje 51: CIA-ini tajni dosjei
programme.desc: Američka vojna baza Područje 51 predmet je špekulacija i teorija zavjere. Sada insajderi otkrivaju što se doista zbiva iza zatvorenih vrata

programme.title: Posljednji ratni heroji
Last War Heroes
programme.desc: On D-Day, the Allies established their beachheads, but they failed to reach any of their key objectives. The beaches weren't linked up; Caen remained in German hands. Meanwhile, Panzer forces were approaching, determined to push the invader into the sea. For the next two months, the two armies would face each other in the fields and villages of Normandy, fighting a battle of attrition

programme.title: Brain Games
programme.desc: Whether you're a skeptic or a believer in the supernatural, you have to admit there are things out there that your brain just can't explain

programme.title: Brain Games
programme.desc: If you think you have full control of your thoughts and actions, think again. It turns out that your brain may be hardwired to want to fit in

programme.title: Ludi znanstvenik
Mad Scientists
programme.desc: John teams up with Robert Baslee, an aeronautics genius who builds full-scale airplanes in his garage and flies them out of his backyard. Robert and John set out to transform one of Robert's planes to fly on pure electricity in just two days. Along with Bill (the battery guy) and Jim (the Human toolbox), they race against the clock to redesign the plane. After several props and a burned up motor, they have to fly off at sunset to get new materials. When the crowd arrives at dawn, they have yet to test their invention. And they will only get one chance. It's all or nothing at sunrise

programme.title: Ludi znanstvenik
Mad Scientists
programme.desc: John teams up with Tim Pickens, a real live rocket scientist with a suitcase rocket, a rocket bike, and a water rocket belt. Tim and John set out to build a water rocket belt strong enough to lift John out of a lake with just the parts they have in Tim's garage. With the help of three young apprentices, they design and build a light, more efficient rocket belt that they hook up to a jet ski. But can they get John all the way out of the water as a crowd of fighter pilot trainees cheer them on

programme.title: Posljedice
Aftermath
programme.desc: Our sun is aging. Like all of us on Earth, every day it's getting older. As it ages, it actually grows increasingly hotter. The sun will use up more and more of its fuel, and the temperature on earth will rise. . Here is a world we'll never see. A world where that natural aging process is sped up, so it takes place on a human scale. How long could our world -- and all of the things we've built -- survive a rapidly aging sun? Take a look into a terrifying future -- where our planet is eventually swallowed by the sun

programme.title: Svjetlost na kraju svijeta
Light At The Edge of The World
programme.desc: Wade Davis makes a remarkable journey into the heart of war-torn Colombia to visit one of the indigenous groups who call themselves the Elder Brother. These extraordinary people claim to be the last descendents of a once great civilization, the Tairona, and to speak with their voice. Could they really be the last window we have on the great high civilizations of the ancient Americas? Wade's journey to find out takes him from the tropical plains of Northern Colombia to the frozen peaks of the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta and a chilling close encounter with the FARC. It also takes him into the heart of one of the most unique indigenous cultures anywhere in the world

programme.title: Posljednji ratni heroji
Last War Heroes
programme.desc: On D-Day, the Allies established their beachheads, but they failed to reach any of their key objectives. The beaches weren't linked up; Caen remained in German hands. Meanwhile, Panzer forces were approaching, determined to push the invader into the sea. programme.title: Najteži popravci
World's Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Grab your sunglasses… This week on World's Toughest Fixes we're going to harness the sun to drive the only operating solar reflective power tower in the United States. This show is definitely not for the superstitious as Riley joins a crew lifting two 65 ton boilers 160 feet up to two towers and suspending them above 24,000 mirrors… One slip up and it's going to be way more than seven years bad luck

programme.title: Znanost glupog, ep. 3
Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The Science of Stupid is the show that combines cold hard science with some of the craziest, most spectacular and painful user generated clips ever recorded. In this episode we learn just how many ways there are to embarrass, injure and humiliate yourself when pole dancing, playing on a pogo stick and cutting down a tree

programme.title: Neukroćena Amerika
Untamed Americas
programme.desc: Stunning HD cinematography produces an epic yet intimate look at the mountains of North and South America. Over 9,000 miles long, a series of mountain chains run from Alaska to the Rockies to the Andes. These mountains are right here in our backyard but we barely know them. Theyre still an untamed wilderness with creatures youve never seen before

programme.title: Yukonsko zlato
Yukon Gold
programme.desc: Klondike Gold Fever is a documentary series following a select group of remarkable family businesses in the Canadian north: Gold miners. These are not big drilling operations with corporate backing and a spot on the Toronto Stock Exchange. They are small, family-run placer mines that survive through grit, resourcefulness, hard won expertise and a deep knowledge and understanding of the land and its history. They have a few short months to earn their living for the entire year and are up against soaring operational costs, unreliable machinery, and Mother Nature. We'll follow these hard-working mining families from the first thaw in the spring, through months of long days and hard, dirty work, to the final freeze up in the fall. In the high stakes game of mining the search for gold is always a gamble and we'll watch as every one of these mining families plays its best hand

programme.title: Autootpad
Strippers: Cars For Cash
programme.desc: Two teams compete to see who can make the most money by buying, breaking and selling parts from scrap cars. The theme for the challenge this week is 'breaking the mould' where each team is tasked to find vehicle that challenged the design and car manufacture norms when it was released. Ben and Frankie decide to forego the traditional fourth wheel when they pick up the classic three-wheeler - the Reliant Robin. George and Sheldon go all green when they purchase the car that brought eco-friendly, hybrid technology to the masses - the Toyota Prius

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
Air crash investigation
programme.desc: August 22nd, 1985 British Airtours Flight #28 is taking off from Manchester Airport for the Greek Island of Corfu. As the aircraft is accelerating, a loud thud emanates from the fuselage, and the pilots abandon takeoff. They believe a tire has blown, but passengers on the left side of the plane see the real problem one of the engines is on fire. Soon, thick black smoke fills the cabin, panicked passengers struggle to escape, and just minutes later, the aircraft is completely ravaged by fire. 55 people die. Can investigators determine how a minor emergency turned into one of the worst disasters in British aviation history

programme.title: Na tragu NLO-a
Chasing UFOs
programme.desc: Baby alien or a tiny species of monkey? In Mexico, Ryder, Ben and James meet a leading UFOlogist to get a first-hand look at a tiny creature of mysterious origin. Firm believer James has no doubt the creature is alien but skeptic Ben offers a more down to earth explanation. While in Mexico, they also investigate the "Mother Ship Videos" incredible footage that some believe shows a mother ship dropping off hundreds of UFOs in the sky. James is further compelled by the fact that two eyewitnesses recorded the same event from two different angles

programme.title: Posljedice
Aftermath
programme.desc: Oil. It makes our modern world go around. We've used it to drive, fly and manufacture our way into the 21st century. But what would happen if the world that so depends on oil -- suddenly ran out? Aftermath: The World Without Oil takes you to a planet you will never see. An Earth -- without oil. How would we have to change our way of life -- to live without the product we depend upon so heavily

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
Air crash investigation
programme.desc: Leading aviation experts are confronted with a shocking theory as they investigate one of the greatest aviation mysteries of all time

programme.title: Žestoko
Slammed
programme.desc: We will go inside the insanely popular world of wrestling that's part sport and part entertainment, from the daily drama of promoters teetering on the edge of bankruptcy to performers risking permanent injury for a shot at fame and fortune. In this verité series, we'll be backstage as NWS's promoters plot how they'll keep their league afloat, scheduling shows and crafting storylines for their "characters" that will keep fans coming back. NOT RESEARCH APPROVED

programme.title: Posljedice
Aftermath
programme.desc: What would happen to the world if the population doubled overnight? How quickly would we run out of water? Power? Food? Mass migration would reshape counties. New high-rises soar would over the cities. But there are only so many resources to go around who will be left behind, as the planet struggles to deal with twice the population

programme.title: Posljedice
Aftermath
programme.desc: The earth has stopped spinning. We are no longer moving at 1000 miles per hour (1670 kilometers per hour) at the equator. Our days and nights are each 6 months long. Oceans part and flood northern and southern cities; most of those around the center of the globe are airless and lifeless. A lucky few human nomads discover the "last place on earth" where they can live year-round, a tiny ocean settlement where humanity ekes out the rest of its days on a non-spinning earth

programme.title: Nordijska divljina
Nordic Wild
programme.desc: Winter has held Scandinavia prisoner for many months, locked in ice and silenced by bitter arctic winds. Finally, slowly, it begins to loosen its grip. Longer days and warmer weather transform the land, uncovering a whole new world

programme.title: Seoba životinja
Animal Mega Moves
programme.desc: A team of British vets and transport engineers attempt to move fifteen racehorses worth a total of $4 million over 10,000 kilometers from England to Hong Kong in a specially adapted Boeing 747 aircraft. We follow the horses being transported to Britain's 3rd busiest airport, Stansted, where they are loaded into special stalls and transferred into the cargo plane. The stalls are secured to the aircrafts fuselage to ensure they remain stable if the horses become agitated during the flight. During the 12-hour flight, a team of vets on-board monitors the horses to ensure they eat enough food and avoid dehydration

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: Stretching from the North Pole to the tropics, Asia is the largest continent on earth. It is the highest and most populated, and life here is harsh. To survive, the animals that inhabit this continent have evolved into the toughest of the tough

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: From the parched deserts of Southwestern USA to lush forests of the Costa Rican mountains, this episode covers some of the most diverse ecosystems on the planet. The creatures here have adapted to survive in an extraordinary variety of habitats, and that means a diverse array of weapons

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: Asia is the largest and most populated continent on the planet. Here people compete for space with some of the most impressive animals in the world. Creatures that have ingenious adaptations to hunt and defend

programme.title: Nordijska divljina
Nordic Wild
programme.desc: Winter has held Scandinavia prisoner for many months, locked in ice and silenced by bitter arctic winds. Finally, slowly, it begins to loosen its grip. Longer days and warmer weather transform the land, uncovering a whole new world

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
Air crash investigation
programme.desc: Leading aviation experts are confronted with a shocking theory as they investigate one of the greatest aviation mysteries of all time

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: The steamy jungles of the Amazon region reverberate with the sound of screeches, growls and grunts. These are the noises of creatures hidden in the trees vying with one another for survival in the forest. 1.Eyelash viper - So called because of the enlarged scales above its eyes, the eyelash viper hangs in the trees

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
Air crash investigation
programme.desc: August 22nd, 1985 British Airtours Flight #28 is taking off from Manchester Airport for the Greek Island of Corfu. As the aircraft is accelerating, a loud thud emanates from the fuselage, and the pilots abandon takeoff. They believe a tire has blown, but passengers on the left side of the plane see the real problem one of the engines is on fire. Soon, thick black smoke fills the cabin, panicked passengers struggle to escape, and just minutes later, the aircraft is completely ravaged by fire. 55 people die. Can investigators determine how a minor emergency turned into one of the worst disasters in British aviation history

programme.title: Sekunde do katastrofe
Seconds from disaster
programme.desc: When a Boeing 747 crashes into a remote mountain-side 45 minutes after take off in 1985, investigators are left baffled. This is the deadliest single-aircraft accident in aviation history, with 520 passengers and crew left dead. Was the crash due to a bomb on board, or could something be flawed in the very structure of all 747s

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
Air crash investigation
programme.desc: Leading aviation experts are confronted with a shocking theory as they investigate one of the greatest aviation mysteries of all time

programme.title: Autocesta kroz pakao
Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: A truck full of wine is sliced in half less than 24 hours after Jamie ships the Rotator to Alberta. Howie tackles this recovery all on his own

programme.title: Ludi znanstvenik
Mad Scientists
programme.desc: John teams up with Robert Baslee, an aeronautics genius who builds full-scale airplanes in his garage and flies them out of his backyard. Robert and John set out to transform one of Robert's planes to fly on pure electricity in just two days. Along with Bill (the battery guy) and Jim (the Human toolbox), they race against the clock to redesign the plane. After several props and a burned up motor, they have to fly off at sunset to get new materials. When the crowd arrives at dawn, they have yet to test their invention. And they will only get one chance. It's all or nothing at sunrise

programme.title: Ludi znanstvenik
Mad Scientists
programme.desc: John teams up with Tim Pickens, a real live rocket scientist with a suitcase rocket, a rocket bike, and a water rocket belt. Tim and John set out to build a water rocket belt strong enough to lift John out of a lake with just the parts they have in Tim's garage. With the help of three young apprentices, they design and build a light, more efficient rocket belt that they hook up to a jet ski. But can they get John all the way out of the water as a crowd of fighter pilot trainees cheer them on

programme.title: Iza kulisa
Inside
programme.desc: For eight years the Taliban and Al-Qaeda have bogged down US and NATO troops in Afghanistan-all the while seizing territory and creating chaos in nuclear-armed Pakistan

programme.title: Iza kulisa
Inside
programme.desc: This documentary will tell us: who the Muslim Brotherhood is, where they come from, what they want, how they are different from the other Muslim groups in Iraq and Afghanistan and where they're going. It will look at what sort of power and influence they will have in the coming months and what this means for Egypt and the rest of the world. And finally, it will look at how the Egyptian situation will affect the latest attempts at peace in Israel

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje u Africi
programme.desc: You want to up the odds of success, up the numbers. The more attackers there are the better their chances and the bigger the prey. A single lion cant take on a giraffe, but a pride will pull it down. A wild dog has no chance against a wildebeest, but a pack will rip it apart. Watch out for any hungry gang when they have their eyes set on a target. These are the animals that thirst for blood in a group. These are Africas gang killers

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Africas wild spaces host an incredible array of creatures…creatures who engage in a daily ballet of life and death. Among this myriad of species is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of mammals, reptiles and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predator skills. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying into their inner sanctums. From the arid Saharan deserts in the north, to the lush plains of the south, to the expansive Nile River, they creep crawl and live where we live, work, and play. This shows climax comes when it reaches the animal whose size, power and skill surpasses all others. To best understand this animal, we not only examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed them to survive and thrive, but hear from someone whos met them first hand…and lived to tell the story. This first-person narrative offers both stunning detail and insight into why this animal is indeed considered one of the deadliest. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are Africas Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: It's a voracious predatory catfish that prowls the rivers of Southeast Asia. Growing up to two meters and weighing over 80 kg, the wallago catfish is a pure carnivore, equipped with formidable jaws and a double band of saw-like teeth, designed to attack

programme.title: Tajne indijske divljine
programme.desc: This is the real story of the jungles made famous in Rudyard Kipling's 'Jungle Book'. It is a battlefield ruled by tooth and claw, where species fight for space, water, food, and mating rights. This is a world that knows nothing of compassion or kindness, dominated by two of the world's top predators, the Bengal Tiger and the Indian Wild Dog or Dhole. Kipling's Jungle Book was fiction. This is hard fact and a story that rewrites itself every year

programme.title: Timbavati: Lavlji ep
programme.desc: In South Africa's Timbavati region, two leopards try to raise their cubs to the best of their abilities. Over a course of months, the cubs will learn all that their mothers have to teach, such as hunting and how to evade predators. But danger is everywhere, even in your own family, proving that Africa can be as brutal as it is beautiful

programme.title: Čuvari lavova
programme.desc: Attack of the Teens: Financial troubles mount at the park whilst Kevin juggles the daily challenges of keeping his lions and hyenas happy and a trip to Botswana helps conserve wild lions

programme.title: Timbavati: Lavlji ep
programme.desc: Some of Africa's most formidable predators live in family groups. We follow the lives of three of these - lion, wild dog and hyena - as they cross paths in Timbavati, near Kruger. The Timbavati pride is a newly formed coalition of three lion brothers, three lionesses and their newborn cubs. In comparison, the Sohebeles have lost their father and their territory. The 5 youngsters are left to their own devices. We compare the structure of the lions' family group to a pack of wild dogs that visit the Timbavati, and the local hyena clan, lead by a powerful matriarch. All three families work in very different ways with one purpose- survival

programme.title: Divlji jelovnik
programme.desc: Even in nature there are rules imposed at many dinner tables, and while some animals follow a strict set of rules, even species that seem to enjoy chaotic free-for-alls at mealtime are actually often demonstrating perfect manners

programme.title: Divlji jelovnik
programme.desc: Whatever an animal's preferred diet -- vegetation, meat, or fish -- eventually it must rid its body of waste: in other words, what goes in, must come out. And in the animal world, one individual's waste may be another's dietary treasure

programme.title: Divlja Šri Lanka
programme.desc: Sri Lanka as a country contains astonishing biodiversity. But one environment on the island is a biodiversity hotspot - even richer and more complex than anywhere else. Many species unique to Sri Lanka live nowhere except its central highlands - in the cloud forests. It's a fast-vanishing habitat. The cool, high, damp conditions are perfect for growing tea

programme.title: Tajne divljine
programme.desc: Across the endless plains of the Serengeti, the crisp white expanses of the Arctic and the windswept, breath-taking Tibetan Plateau, innovative techniques allow us to access remote habitats and capture rare animal behavior, without disrupting the animals daily struggle for survival

programme.title: Divlji zapad
programme.desc: In the barren deserts of the Wild West, Gila monsters have a show down on a ghost town Main Street, while a gang of Harris hawks pack-hunt among the cacti. Cannibalistic scorpions face off in the dunes, with pincers drawn - only one will make it out alive. Rattlers duel for the favors of the ladies, and a tribe of Native Americans test the endurance of their riders and horses on an epic race

programme.title: Divlja Kolumbija
programme.desc: In the middle of Colombia, lies an unique and little explored outcrop of sandstone; the Serrania de la Macarena. It forms part of the country's first ever national park where more than 15 million specimens were found
programme.category: Prirodno blago Serranie De La macarene

programme.title: Divlja Indonezija
programme.desc: Borneo is the worlds third largest island, and Sumatra is no dwarf in comparison. Both islands became cut off from the Asian mainland when sea levels rose at the end of the last ice age 12,000 years ago. Large animals became marooned, isolated from their mainland cousins. Over time, they have adapted and evolved to their new home developing an array of unique traits on each island. Today, these are the Islands of Monsters

programme.title: Divlja Kolumbija
programme.desc: Spanning the western length of Colombia, the Chocó region is rich with biodiversity. It is the wettest place on earth and the only country in South America to be bathed by both the Pacific and Atlantic oceans. The rainforests, isolated by the Andes, host a habitat of unique, endemic and yet-to-be discovered species

programme.title: Divlja Kanada
programme.desc: From the prairies to Canada's vast boreal forest that stretches almost from coast to coast, we reveal a huge wilderness of extremes that has been shaped over millennia by both humans and wildfires. Here pronghorn antelope, the fastest hoofed land animal on earth, still haunt the grasslands, the elusive wolverine thrives in the icy remote northern forests and beaver share their cozy lodges with grateful muskrats

programme.title: Divlja Šri Lanka
programme.desc: Sri Lanka as a country contains astonishing biodiversity. But one environment on the island is a biodiversity hotspot - even richer and more complex than anywhere else. Many species unique to Sri Lanka live nowhere except its central highlands - in the cloud forests. It's a fast-vanishing habitat. The cool, high, damp conditions are perfect for growing tea

programme.title: 24 sata u divljini
programme.desc: The Africa savannah crosses 25 countries and is home to millions of animals. Here herbivores and carnivores are caught in a constant struggle for survival. From the apex carnivore, the lion, to the humble meerkat, this film charts 24 hours of life here, through day, night and day again, revealing incredible behaviour driven by the evolutionary clock of time

programme.title: 24 sata u divljini
programme.desc: This film follows a group of animals over 24 hours living in and around one of the driest desert regions on Earth: the Atacama in northern Chile

programme.title: 24 sata u divljini: Tasmanija
programme.desc: From the forests to the waters, this is a snapshot of the extraordinary lives of Tasmania's animals over 24 hours. This land of unique creatures south of the Australian mainland has an extraordinary variety of strange and bizarre creatures

programme.title: Tajne divljine
programme.desc: Across the endless plains of the Serengeti, the crisp white expanses of the Arctic and the windswept, breath-taking Tibetan Plateau, innovative techniques allow us to access remote habitats and capture rare animal behavior, without disrupting the animals daily struggle for survival

programme.title: Tajne divljine
programme.desc: The planets rivers, lakes and oceans are home to billions of earths most astonishing creatures. They haven’t always been the most accessible, but now we can go to places once out of reach to find everything from the giants of the oceans to the tiniest sea creatures, almost invisible to the naked eye

programme.title: Tajne divljine
programme.desc: Dense forests, vast tracts of mountains and rugged terrain these are the earths remote, isolated wild places. Life here is hard and recording it just as challenging. Finding and then getting close to the few, wary creatures of these special worlds has taken decades

programme.title: Kraljevi koji nestaju
programme.desc: The story of 5 young lions that must conquer the Namib desert and establish their own kingdom in this place of constant danger, everlasting hunger and thirst, and inevitable suffering

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca 3
programme.desc: This episode reveals the secret tactics of the Animal Kingdom's most ferocious feline fighters, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed fights from Africa, the Americas and beyond. From the big to the small, the fearsome to the furry, the world's most crazy cat contenders make for an adrenaline-fueled Animal Fight Club

programme.title: Tajni život grabežljivaca - Izloženi
Tajni život grabežljivaca, Izloženi
programme.desc: The hunters are forced to specialize, develop unexpected strategies and display incredible fortitude. Our perception of some of the most iconic predators will be turned upside down, and we'll be introduced to a few surprising carnivores

programme.title: Tajni život grabežljivaca
programme.desc: Worldwide, predators that inhabit open spaces must hide in plain sight in order to thrive. On the vast plains of the African savanna, banded mongooses rely on strength in numbers in order to succeed in a land of giants

programme.title: Tajni život grabežljivaca
programme.desc: If you're a forest predator, success requires using trees to bridge the gap between life and death. In this realm, danger - or your next meal - could be behind you, below, or above you. Whether you're a Harpy eagle, zeroing in on prey from high in the rainforest canopy, a cunning weasel, scouring for a meal in and out of mossy logs, or a Bengal tiger, trying to stalk in a bare, dry forest, catching prey among the trees is a challenge

programme.title: Tajni život grabežljivaca
programme.desc: In our planet's liquid space, predators of all shapes and sizes face incredible obstacles to success - and survival, because underwater battlefields test the mettle of even the biggest and deadliest carnivores

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: Vohne Liche Kennels is a K-9 training facility for specialized police and military service dogs. This week the pressure is on Bobby to make sure the Special Forces troops are ready to graduate from Vohne Liches dog handling program. Meanwhile, Kenny and the guys are away conducting police training as well as honoring a fallen officer. Kenny challenges KC to learn rappelling, and before the end of the day one of them ends up in the hospital

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: At Vohne Liche, a new group of soldiers are paired up with their dogs and taught to detect bombs under an "explosive scenario." Kenny gets concerned when one dog shows signs of post-traumatic stress. Meanwhile, KC causes his own flare-ups, when he shows up late and gets into an altercation with a client

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: The disputed borders between land and water come in many different forms-beaches, riverbanks, swamps and frozen ice. Each is home to its own dramas and conflicts, as aquatic and terrestrial creatures meet and engage in combat. Predators learn to hunt in different elements, and prey must watch for attacks from every direction

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: In the animal kingdom a covert assassin emerged. Lurking in the shadows, ready to pounce at lighting speeds, he searches for his next meal. He fights for survival, battling his foes. He is an animal ninja and possesses the skills to kill: speed, stealth, agility, patience and weapons. In the next hour, the world’s deadliest animals will use their jaw dropping talents to fight to live another day. From stealthy cats to patient seals, giant centipedes to kick-boxing kangaroos, these animals will amaze us all on World’s Deadliest: Animal Ninja Warriors

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Zeb Hogan is in Florida, on the bank of the Indian River, investigating stories he's heard about man-eaters living in waterways just like this one. Rumors of big sharks in fresh water, far from the ocean, lead to a suspect- bull sharks

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Zeb is in search of a fish with a terrifying reputation. Wolf fish, known locally as haimara, can reach one-meter in length, weigh as much as 88 pounds and are a species said to be a brutal hunter-of animals and reportedly even humans

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: This episode welcomes viewers to the deadly world of the most armed and dangerous gangsters, assassins, and con artists of the animal kingdom. A gang of flesh-eating fish take down a river rat; the Bengal tiger shows just how to get the job done—alone; ta red-back spider lures, then eats her date; a femme fatale like no other, mama brown bear goes head to head with another bear to protect her young; and a pack of killer whales demonstrate how they live up to their name

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: Golden sands, warm crystal-clear water, palm trees… it sounds like heaven, but there can be a dark side to paradise. Living in the world’s most idyllic places is no holiday for many animals—this is fiercely contested real estate, and the hunting grounds of some truly terrifying and deadly creatures. The world’s most exotic destinations can be a Predator Paradise

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: Some baby predators must learn hunting from their parents, while others are deadly from the first day they are born. And some deceive their prey or manipulate their brains. In a world where only the strong survive, these babies come out swinging

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: The disputed borders between land and water come in many different forms-beaches, riverbanks, swamps and frozen ice. Each is home to its own dramas and conflicts, as aquatic and terrestrial creatures meet and engage in combat. Predators learn to hunt in different elements, and prey must watch for attacks from every direction

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: Our planet's mightiest predators don't always get their own way-the tables can be turned on these mighty hunters when the underdog fights back. An enormous Nile crocodile learns a harsh lesson that hippos aren't to be messed with, and a lion-the so-called "King of the Jungle"-pays dearly after messing with a buffalo. A shark is dispatched by a giant octopus, while a gazelle teaches a cheetah a painful lesson

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: This episode welcomes viewers to the deadly world of the most feudal families, almighty monarchs, territorial clans, and awesome armies of the animal kingdom. Holding the crown for the largest land carnivore in the world, polar bears feast like kings, eating all the seals they can. Giraffes go head to head in epic neck jousting battles over lady giraffes; sand-tiger sharks—wage wars in utero; and wildebeest warriors get the upper hand—or hoof—in one of the greatest wildlife migrations on earth. Watch how these creatures and the rest of our species duke it out in the World’s Deadliest: Game of Thrones

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: In science fiction, lethal morphing Transformers may be a figment of the imagination, but here on Earth, beware, transformers are for real! Whether it’s to hunt or protect itself against predators, they’re spine-chilling killing machines ready to mutate in surprising and amazing ways. Some of the world’s deadliest animals use their talents to transform in astonishing ways. From colour changing to shape shifting, getting fierce, turning up the heat, fooling their prey or simply letting it fly, these animals do anything it takes to survive on World’s Deadliest: Transformers

programme.title: Ubojice s obale jezera
programme.desc: Deep within Africa's heart lies the Zambezi Valley. At the center of this wilderness lies a great lake, an Eden like nowhere else on earth. Here we meet three males lions; Takunda, Gombwe and Zindoga. They are coming into their prime, but still have much to prove

programme.title: Tigar u bijegu
programme.desc: "Tiger on the Run" is a natural history documentary following a young tiger in India, that's been forced out of his home territory by another male, and has to struggle for survival. The film promises to address the issue of habitat destruction and interaction of tigers and humans caused by the shrinking habitat

programme.title: Orlovi
programme.desc: Eagles are top predators, who battle fiercely for survival and work hard to raise their young. To explore the world of the eagle we follow one individual from hatching to leaving the nest and setting up a home

programme.title: Kronike odmetnika: "Hells Angels"
Kronike odmetnika: Hells Angels
programme.desc: Bivši vođa "Hells Angelsa" vodi nas iza kulisa krvavih borbi. Njegova priča oživljava pokušaje FBI-a da slome vodstvo bande uz pomoć oružanih racija u klubovima

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: U zalagaonicu stiže stablo s revolverom iz 1800-ih godina. Chumlee postaje kreativan kad ugleda renesansnu grafiku Pietra Facchettija, dok Stari inzistira da zalagaonica ponudi popust na Dan umirovljenika

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: U zalagaonicu stiže autoportret gitarista Rona Wooda iz "The Rolling Stonesa". Ricka hvata nostalgija kad mu poštom stignu ljubavna pisma koja je pisao Mickey Rooney. Rick razmišlja o kupnji minijaturnih automobila iz djetinjstva

programme.title: Američki "skupljači"
American Pickers
programme.desc: Vođa grupe "The Black Keys", Dan Auerbach, odlučio je Mikeu pokvariti planove o prodaji starinske gitare. Sammy se teško odvaja od predmeta koji predstavljaju obiteljsku povijest

programme.title: Potraga za izgubljenim divovima
programme.desc: Kad braća Vieira krenu prema zapadu da bi istražili otok obavijen velom tajne, otkrivaju uvjerljiv dokaz postojanja divova. No njihova potraga skreće u mračnom smjeru

programme.title: Američki "skupljači"
American Pickers
programme.desc: Frank i Mike vode tijesnu borbu dok se dečki utrkuju na stazi da vide tko ima najbrži automobil

programme.title: Drvosječe
programme.desc: U Washingtonu Gabe ostaje bez svoje titule "Kralja planine" koju mu oduzima nova ekipa. No u pomoć mu priskače neočekivani član obitelji. U Chapmanu se najnoviji član ekipe bori za život

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice: Južna Afrika
Pawn stars
programme.desc: Jesu li grafiti umjetnost? To pitanje muči Roya jer mu nude skejtbord s grafitima. U istome nastavku vidimo i pušku britanskog vojnika Leeja Enfielda i opremu za pustinju iz Drugog svjetskog rata

programme.title: Američke restauracije
programme.desc: Rick Harrison iz "Zvijezda zalagonice" dolazi u trgovinu u potrazi za rođendanskim darom za svoga sina Coreyja. Rick Dale nudi mu novi kauč izrađen od starog automobila. No lov na najkulerskiji klasik ipak je mnogo teži nego što je očekivao

programme.title: Najbolje na četiri kotača
programme.desc: Auto marke Datsun 260z iz 1978. slavno je po tome što ima obilježja superauta, a nije skup.Ovaj je auto predovdio japansku invaziju diljem svijeta

programme.title: Neustrašivi aljaški vozači
programme.desc: U dolini rijeke Wolf pet ekipa kreće na off-road utrku duž države Aljaske. Na putu ih čekaju razne prepreke: rijeke, planine, zarasle rudarske staze pa ekipe moraju surađivati kako bi zajedno pobijedile surovi sjeverni teren

programme.title: Američki "skupljači"
American Pickers
programme.desc: Zbog pregovaračkih vještina koje posjeduje Veliki Moe, Mike ga doživljava nadmoćnijim. A pastor Bill živi kao da je svaki dan Božić

programme.title: Gorštaci
programme.desc: Marty Meierotto mogao bi ostati zarobljen u gorju Revelation Mountains dok leti preko ledene rijeke
programme.category: Gdje ima dima, ima i vatre

programme.title: Drvosječe
programme.desc: Serija "Drvosječe" na pola je sezone, a pritisak da što bolje okončaju sezonu veći je nego ikad. Na Pacifičkom sjeverozapadu ekipa "Rygaard Logging" počela je upisivati sve veći broj klada zahvaljujući DJ-u Jeremiahu, ali danas… Nije se pojavio

programme.title: Ljudi iz močvare
programme.desc: Močvarnjaci se bore protiv golemih aligatora i Majke Prirode jer žele osvojiti "Blago u rukavcu". Jedan je lovac zašao duboko u močvaru kako bi uhvatio legendarnog gmaza

programme.title: Leepu i Pitbull
programme.desc: Dečki preuzimaju prvi kamionet, "Chevy S10" u iznimno lošem stanju. Leepu kamionet promatra kao prazno platno i ima velike planove da ga posve preinači

programme.title: Oživljavanje starih auta
programme.desc: Legendarni roker George Lynch iz grupe "Dokken" svratio je u radionicu "Buickom Rivierom" iz 1965. te daje Dannyju odriješene ruke da ga uredi u stilu "Grofove" radionice. Hoće li Danny usrećiti čovjeka koji obožava aute jednako kao glazbu

programme.title: Oživljavanje starih auta
programme.desc: Klijent želi dotjerati svoj "Harley Davidson Road Glide" iz 2004. godine, ali Shannon i Ryan nisu sigurni da će uspjeti. Drugi skupljač svratio je u radionicu da Dannyju pokaže "Lincoln Mark III" iz 1970. godine. Danny jedva čeka da ga isproba

programme.title: Lovci na kamione
programme.desc: S parkirališta su ukrali kamion pun alkohola u vrijednosti od 120.000 dolara te počinje utrka za nagradu od 3300 dolara. Tko će prvi pronaći kamion? Big T. i Bek moraju skrenuti s puta jer im je zbog divljanja na cesti vozač poslao poruku upomoć

programme.title: Lovci na kamione
programme.desc: Iz sjedišta "Platinum Truckinga" ukrali su dva kamiona s energetskim napitcima vrijednim 45.000 dolara. Čini se da je umiješan netko iznutra. Tri ekipe ulaze u otvorenu borbu: nagrada za svaki kamion iznosi 5000 dolara, što je pozamašna svota

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: Nađite mjesta uz ring dok se zvijezde zalagaonice nadmeću za suvenire boksačkog prvaka Rockyja Marciana. Rick odlazi pogledati jedinstven auto na baterije koji svjetli u mraku, a Chumlee rabi modernu tehnologiju da bi se "teleprezentirao" u posao

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: Iskusite paranormalno sa zvijezdama zalagaonice kad se pojave dva prva izdanja "Božićne pjesme". Ricka uzdrma meteorit, a Chumlee planira kuglanje s dečkima. No hoće li im njihovo druženje odgovarati

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: Postanite vrhunski fliperaš uz zvijezde zalagaonice kad Chumlee odlazi pogledati dva aparata. Rick ne razmišlja mnogo dok pregledava kapsulu koju su nosili golubovi pismonoše u 2. svjetskom ratu. Dečki zafrkavaju Ricka kad se odluči baviti boksom

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice

programme.desc: Čitač Morseove abecede iz Drugog svjetskog rata stiže u zalagaonicu. Klijent donosi pismo koje je napisao državni tajnik John Quincy Adams koji je poslije bio i predsjednik. Corey želi preuzeti organizaciju tradicionalne roštiljade za 4. srpnja

programme.desc: Godine 2014. FBI je objavio mogućnost da je Hitler pobjegao u Južnu Ameriku. Uz povjerljive podatke koji otkrivaju nove tragove, u emisiji "U potrazi za Hitlerom" pokušavaju riješiti zagonetku o smrti najvećeg zločinca svih vremena

programme.title: Napoleon - pohod na Rusiju
Napoleon: The Campaign of Russia
programme.desc: Napoleon je izgubio polovicu svojih trupa prije dolaska u Moskvu. Konačni neuspjeh bio je prelazak Berezine gdje se ostatak njegove vojske utopio, a on je pobjegao i ostavio svoje ljude. Godine 1812. Napoleon je okupio vojsku od 600 000 vojnika, pripadnika 24 različita naroda, najveću vojsku ikad stvorenu. Protivno savjetima svojih najbližih savjetnika, maršira prema Moskvi odlučan u namjeri da pokori Rusiju. 172 dana poslije, Napoleon se povlači i iza sebe ostavlja 400 000 svojih vojnika, mrtvih ili zarobljenih. Ova dokumentarna drama prikazuje ovu najznamenitiju i najlegendarniju vojnu kampanju. Također pokušava otkriti zašto je Napoleon odlučio osvojiti Rusiju, kako je najveći vođa tog vremena mogao počiniti toliko strateških pogrešaka i kako su ga doživljavali Rusi, drugi europski vladari i njegove vlastite trupe

programme.title: Otkrivanje vremena
Time Team
programme.desc: Emisija Otkrivanje vremena posjećuje mali vjetroviti otok na obalama Walesa. Na otoku je davno pronađeno mnoštvo tajanstvenih predmeta koji ukazuju da je otok možda bio nekakvo religiozno središte

programme.title: Muzejske tajne
Mysteries at the Museum
programme.desc: Ova epizoda prikazuje pažljivo očuvani uvojak kose koji pripada jednom od najznamenitijih američkih spisatelja, Edgaru Allanu Poeu. (S2, Ep18)

programme.title: Znameniti špijuni
Spymasters
programme.desc: Elizabeth Van Lew bila je jedna od najodvažnijih i najuspješnijih špijunki Amričkoga građanskoga rata. Rukovodila je širokom obavještajnom mrežom u glavnom gradu Konfederacije Richmondom u Virginiji

The Hidden Side of World War II

programme.title: II. svjetski rat: cijena Carstva
World War II: The Price of Empire
programme.desc: Invazija na Poljsku prisiljava čak i najotpornije države na objavu rata. Britanski premijer zamijenjen je Winstonom Churchillom. Rat započinje mornaričkim sukobima. (S1, Ep2)

Great Continental Railway Journeys

programme.title: Zabranjena povijest

programme.title: Na tračnicama bivšega Carstva
On the Rails of the Double Headed Eagle
programme.desc: Emisija prikazuje razvoj ogromne željezničke mreže Dunavske Monarhije koja je izgrađena da poveže stepe Galicije i obale Jadranskog mora

programme.title: Otkriveni spomenici
Monuments Revealed
programme.desc: Posjetiteljima je teško dočarati sveobuhvatan tlocrt Petre jer je jednostavno prevelik. Pomoću 3D i kompozitnih slika, istražite ovaj nevjerojatan grad u cijelosti

programme.title: Napoleon - pohod na Rusiju
Napoleon: The Campaign of Russia
programme.desc: Napoleon je izgubio polovicu svojih trupa prije dolaska u Moskvu. Konačni neuspjeh bio je prelazak Berezine gdje se ostatak njegove vojske utopio, a on je pobjegao i ostavio svoje ljude. Godine 1812. Napoleon je okupio vojsku od 600 000 vojnika, pripadnika 24 različita naroda, najveću vojsku ikad stvorenu. Protivno savjetima svojih najbližih savjetnika, maršira prema Moskvi odlučan u namjeri da pokori Rusiju. 172 dana poslije, Napoleon se povlači i iza sebe ostavlja 400 000 svojih vojnika, mrtvih ili zarobljenih. Ova dokumentarna drama prikazuje ovu najznamenitiju i najlegendarniju vojnu kampanju. Također pokušava otkriti zašto je Napoleon odlučio osvojiti Rusiju, kako je najveći vođa tog vremena mogao počiniti toliko strateških pogrešaka i kako su ga doživljavali Rusi, drugi europski vladari i njegove vlastite trupe

programme.title: Tajne Biblije
Secret Bible
programme.desc: Veliki potop je biblijska priča koja govori o najvećoj apokalipsi, ali još nisu pronađeni dokazi koji je potkrepljuju. Američki oceanografi Bill Ryan i Walter Pitman odlučili su riješiti tajnu

programme.title: Tajne Biblije
Secret Bible
programme.desc: Tudor Parfitt tvrdi da je otkrio nevjerojatnu tajnu, izgubljeno pleme Lemba čije podrijetlo seže u vrijeme Židova iz Staroga zavjeta

programme.desc: Ovaj dokumentarac prikazuje nevjerojatno otkriće francuskog arheologa Alberta Gayeta koji je 1900 otkrio koptske mumije u srednjem Egiptu

programme.title: Veliko na prodaji
Selling Big

programme.title: Veliko na prodaji
Selling Big
programme.desc: U Edmontonu imaju pune ruke posla prkoseći oluji dok se pripremaju za još jednu rekordnu dražbu. Jedinstveno vojno vozilo Hagglund glavna je atrakcija na ovoj dražbi. (S2, Ep13)

programme.title: Veliko na prodaji
Selling Big
programme.desc: Ritchie Bros. otvaraju sezonu dražbi u Kanadi u Grande Prairieu u Alberti. Dražbovatelji će pokušati srušiti svoj kanadski rekord od milijardu dolara iz 2012. (S1, Ep1)

programme.title: Veliko na prodaji
Selling Big
programme.desc: U ovoj epizodi Ritchie Bros. kreću na turneju i putuju u Drayton Valley u Alberti gdje farmeri Len i Vicki Paulson rasprodaju imovinu jer odlaze u mirovinu. (S1, Ep2)

programme.title: Veliko na prodaji
Selling Big
programme.desc: Kako bi srušili prošlogodišnju rekordnu prodaju od milijardu dolara u Kanadi, ekipa Ritchie Bros.-a mora postići najbolje rezultate na najvećoj kanadskoj dražbi godine. (S1, Ep3)

How It Works

programme.title: Kako stvari funkcioniraju
How It Works
programme.desc: Zavirit ćemo u fascinantan svijet optike. A zatim će ovisnici o čokoladi moći uživati u čarima belgijske čokolade

programme.title: Kako stvari funkcioniraju
How It Works

programme.title: Kako stvari funkcioniraju
How It Works
programme.desc: Posjetit ćemo tvornicu u kojoj proizvode svjetski poznate kaubojske šešire Resistol. Zatim pratimo dogodovštine aluminijske prtljage

programme.title: Čovjek i divljina
Where the Wild Men are
programme.desc: Ben putuje u SAD u močvare južne Georgije gdje boravi sa 64-godišnjim Colbertom, bivšim gradskim financijskim tajkunom koji sada živi poput Tarzana

programme.title: Kraljevi drva
Timber Kings
programme.desc: Peter na maglovitom Newfoundlandu gradi brvnaru za lovce na patke i upoznaje otočnu kulturu. Joeu i Nellie gori pod petama dok ih vatrogasci uče kako da zaštite svoju brvnaru. (S2, Ep2)

programme.title: Kraljevi drva
Timber Kings
programme.desc: Joel daje sve od sebe u nadi da će ugovor za četiri brvnare u Michiganu uroditi narudžbom za još 16. Andreova jednostavna obnova kuhinje pretvara se u mnogo složeniji posao odo očekivanog. (S2, Ep3)

programme.title: Diži!
Jacked
programme.desc: Jeremy Patterson još se oporavlja od operacije ramena dok seli kokošinjac svoje žene i kćeri pet kilometara dalje do njihove nove kuće, i to sve bez dozvole. (S1, Ep5)

programme.title: Diži!
Jacked
programme.desc: Graditelji odlaze u na obalu Jerseyja gdje podižu najtežu drvenu kuću u svojoj karijeri. (S1, Ep6)

programme.title: Prijevoz brvnara
Cabin Truckers
programme.desc: Kelly i selitelji morat će dobro paziti kako u selidbi ne bi oštetili novu kuću. Pogotovo zato što se i naručitelji žele voziti s njima. (S1, Ep3)

programme.title: Prijevoz brvnara
Cabin Truckers
programme.desc: Lorainne Guckert skupila je više od 15.000 dolara za spas stoljetne crkve od rušenja. Sad je Wade i njegova ekipa moraju prevesti do muzeja. (S1, Ep4)

programme.title: Prijevoz brvnara
Cabin Truckers
programme.desc: Pat Ross je besplatno nabavio kuću za svoju kćer. Sad je mora preseliti 460 km dalje kroz Calgary prometnim cestama i poljima punim stoke i ograda na novu lokaciju. (S1, Ep5)

programme.title: Prijevoz brvnara
Cabin Truckers
programme.desc: Wade i njegova ekipa sele bungalov za sina jednog od zaposlenika. No naizgled jednostavnu selidbu ometa neočekivana magla. (S1, Ep6)

programme.title: Prijevoz brvnara
Cabin Truckers
programme.desc: Tyler i Amy Deck žele se odseliti iz grada i odgajati svog sina u prirodi okruženi divljim životinjama i jezerima. Našli su savršenu kuću, ali 115 km dalje u Maple Creeku. (S1, Ep7)

programme.title: Tragači za blagom
Prospectors
programme.desc: Gromobran. Dorrisi ponovno dižu u zrak svoje slavno nalazište amazonita. Cardwelli doživljavaju strašno iskustvo bojeći se za goli život. Homer se oprašta od Dwaynea. (S3, Ep6)

programme.title: Potraga za žadom
Jade Fever
programme.desc: Situacija je napeta jer strani ulagač nenadano dolazi provjeriti kako napreduje rudarenje na planini Wolverine. (S1, Ep9)

programme.title: Potraga za žadom
Jade Fever
programme.desc: Ekipa napokon nailazi na konkretne grumene žada na planini Wolverine, ali uskoro otkriju da su možda prešli granice posjeda. (S1, Ep10)

programme.title: Čovjek i divljina
Where the Wild Men are

programme.title: Kolosalne selidbe
Massive Moves
programme.desc: Obitelj iz Silexa u Missouriju angažira tim stručnjaka za velike selidbe kako bi spasili svoj dragi dom iz poplavljene ravnice. (S1, Ep12)
